definition: (baseball) a hit that flies straight out from the batter
details:
noun
- (baseball) a hit that flies straight out from the batter
= example: (baseball) a hit that flies straight out from the batter
= synonyms: line drive
- a large commercial ship (especially one that carries passengers on a regular schedule)
= synonyms: ocean liner
- a piece of cloth that is used as the inside surface of a garment
= synonyms: lining
- a protective covering that protects an inside surface
= synonyms: lining
